alert.note: Alert for Merced (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 19 at 9:36AM PDT until further notice by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in California... Merced River at Stevinson affecting Merced County. For the Merced River...including Happy Isles, Pohono Bridge, Stevinson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast to continue this week. * WHERE...Merced River at Stevinson. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 70.5 feet, Water is up to the maintenance building in Hagaman Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM PDT Sunday, March 18 the stage was 71.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM PDT Sunday was 71.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 71.5 feet this evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 71.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 70.5 feet on 03/21/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Location Fld Observed Forecasts (10 am PDT) -------- Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Merced River Stevinson 71.0 71.3 Sun 8 am PDT 71.6 71.7 71.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 945 PM PDT.
